Method Detail

getConfig

public static PropertiesCfg getConfig()
Get environment type-related configuration

Returns:
environment configuration

getType

public static java.lang.String getType()
Determine type of environment. This additional method is required because the information is first needed at startup of WxConfig. At that point it is not yet possible to query the property in the normal way. So although this method somewhat duplicates functionality, it is still necessary.

Returns:
Type of environment as configured by property "wx.config.environment.type"

clearType

public static void clearType()
Empty environment type, so that after a change of the environment type, files are read correctly

checkConfig

public static void checkConfig()
The format for the environment config was changed and an automated migration is not possible, beause the old format contained considerably less information. So when an old installation of WxConfig is upgraded, it may be necessary to delete the old environment settings and replace them with the template that is normally used for new installations.
